attributes.review: I love Donald trump so much and I totally 100% stand by his amazing jaw dropping views but this app is total trash! It kept crashing and spamming my phone! It got so bad to the point where I might consider voting for Biden 🤭
attributes.title: Worst app ever!

attributes.review: if i could rate this app a 0 star rating i would😾!! awful!! trump promised pics of him in his cute new wig but those were not give😾😾!! if i could i would she him over this app!! discusting awful terrible!! if this man expects me to vote for him this year he is surely misinformed!! i hate u donald😾😾!! although i would appreciate it if you hand over your son barron! save barron 2020!!🥺
attributes.title: do not get!!😾

attributes.review: This is a very bad app do not download it unless you’re downloading it to leave a review, this app exploded my phone and now I had to buy a new one so plz DO NOT AnD I RePeAt DO NOT DoWNLoAD this app 🍊✨
attributes.title: Your phone will get a virus 🦠

attributes.review: Don’t download this trash app. The app crashed, and I started getting all kinds of calls.... did they sell my information?! Ugh,Sad.
attributes.title: So disappointed 😕

attributes.review: I got this app and just thought it was some app for trump but than I got ads about my personal info and things that I’ve searched up
attributes.title: bad

attributes.review: This app almost made me die because of this app we saw something that was unexplainable, we were traumatized on what we saw, it was that scarring that I almost died
attributes.title: DONT Download this app

attributes.review: is it possible to give this app less than one star it really is the worst app i’ve ever experienced, it’s disgusting, when i first opened it it was kinda pretty but then it went passed the opening screen and then then i saw an orange creep that i think my be a leader of something but definitely not mine he is so creepy looking and i don’t like it
attributes.title: awful

attributes.review: i really thought i would enjoy this app becuase i’ve always loved trump and i always wanted to meet him and make a fan cam 🤩🤩🤩 but after downloading i started feeling thoughts of hate towards everybody but white men but i couldn’t act on it 🙀 so i called up trump and he killed my family cause my sister and mom are women and my dad is liberal 😔
attributes.title: this app killed my family !!

attributes.review: this app steals all your data and sells it to 3rd parties. I’ve been on mailing lists for a bunch of Republicans since I got this app and it keeps crashing. I would rate 0 stars if I could
attributes.title: TRASH

attributes.review: My phone over heated and I had to purchase a new battery because this app would not stop crashing my phone. Thanks Trump! No longer voting for you.
attributes.title: I AM FURIOUS
